about_the_game:
Pixel Golf Club is an engaging arcade pixel golf game that immerses players in a beautifully crafted world of golfing greens. Combining nostalgic pixel art with modern gameplay, it offers a delightful visual treat and a deeply immersive experience.

Key Features:

  • Pixel Art Aesthetics:

     Stunning pixel graphics bring each golf course to life, enhancing the overall atmosphere and visual appeal.

  • Relaxing Gameplay:

     Smooth and calming gameplay with serene soundscapes and ambient music provides a perfect escape.

  • Challenging Courses:

     Uniquely designed courses with various obstacles and terrains test your precision and timing.

  • Skill Development:

     Hone your golfing skills by mastering different techniques and strategies.

  • Immersive Experience:

     Lose yourself in endless green expanses and discover the joy of hitting the perfect shot.
detailed_description:
Feature List


About the Game



Pixel Golf Club is an engaging arcade pixel golf game that immerses players in a beautifully crafted world of golfing greens. Combining nostalgic pixel art with modern gameplay, it offers a delightful visual treat and a deeply immersive experience.

Key Features:

  • Pixel Art Aesthetics:

     Stunning pixel graphics bring each golf course to life, enhancing the overall atmosphere and visual appeal.

  • Relaxing Gameplay:

     Smooth and calming gameplay with serene soundscapes and ambient music provides a perfect escape.

  • Challenging Courses:

     Uniquely designed courses with various obstacles and terrains test your precision and timing.

  • Skill Development:

     Hone your golfing skills by mastering different techniques and strategies.

  • Immersive Experience:

     Lose yourself in endless green expanses and discover the joy of hitting the perfect shot.
name: Pixel Golf Club

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Pixel Golf Club is an arcade pixel golf game that lets you unwind in a delightful world of grand golfing greens. Unleash your potential, aiming for precision and speed across endless lush landscapes.
